data.lyric:
[ti:I'll Kill You]
[ar:Summer Walker/Jhené Aiko]
[al:Over It (Clean)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]I'll Kill You (Explicit) - Summer Walker/Jhené Aiko
[00:03.53]Lyrics by：Summer Walker/Aubrey Robinson/Kendall Roark Bailey/Scott Storch/Jhené Aiko Efuru Chilombo/London Holmes
[00:07.06]Composed by：Summer Walker/Aubrey Robinson/Kendall Roark Bailey/Scott Storch/Jhené Aiko Efuru Chilombo/London Holmes
[00:10.59]If them buy you better be blood
[00:14.19]
[00:15.20]If it ain't me or your mama shouldn't be showin'
[00:17.92]You no love
[00:19.98]Please forgive me I know that I'm stingy
[00:23.73]'Cause baby I'm gang 'bout you
[00:26.13]Ain't playing no games 'bout you
[00:28.69]I'll go to hell or jail 'bout you boy I
[00:33.69]I'll go to hell or jail 'bout you boy
[00:38.28]I'll go to hell or jail 'bout you boy
[00:42.92]I'll go to hell or jail 'bout you boy
[00:47.59]I've been waiting so long for a love like this
[00:52.20]I've been waiting so long for a love like this
[00:56.81]I've been waiting so long for a love like this
[01:01.47]Waiting so long yeah
[01:05.02]That's on my mama yeah that's on the hood
[01:07.21]Don't want no problems I wish a b***h would
[01:09.50]Try to come between us it won't end up good
[01:11.82]You know I love you like no one else could
[01:14.06]I'd go to hell and back for ya
[01:16.43]Bend over backwards acrobats for ya yeah
[01:19.15]I'd go up to bat for ya
[01:21.06]Even when s**t lookin' bad for ya
[01:24.47]I been waiting so long for a love like this
[01:29.01]It's a feeling so strong I don't wanna resist
[01:33.69]Like you can't do no wrong got me losin' my s**t
[01:38.02]Gotta loosen my grip grip nah
[01:42.07]F**k that my baby you all mine
[01:44.61]Greatest of all time
[01:46.29]You better tell them hoes fall in line
[01:49.26]I do not play about mine
[01:51.12]You know this energy so right
[01:53.87]Don't put up no fight
[01:55.82]You know I never tell no lie
[01:58.46]I want you for life
[02:00.88]Don't have have me lookin' foolish don't long
[02:07.37]Don't have me feelin' stupid
[02:10.18]Choose a lover you got me all tied up
[02:14.94]Sometimes you just no you get me all fired up
[02:19.85]I've been waiting so long for a love like this
[02:24.29]I've been waiting so long for a love like this
[02:29.20]I've been waiting so long for a love like this
[02:33.80]Waiting so long so long
[02:36.85]Your lovin' can't be too much for me too much
[02:43.73]We got London on the track
[02:45.72]On the track track
data.trans:
[ti:I'll Kill You]
[ar:Summer Walker/Jhené Aiko]
[al:Over It (Clean)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:03.53]//
[00:07.06]//
[00:10.59]如果有人挑衅你 最好付出血的代价
[00:14.19]
[00:15.20]如果不是我或是你妈妈 不应该向你
[00:17.92]示爱
[00:19.98]请原谅我 我知道我小肚鸡肠
[00:23.73]宝贝 我和你站在同一战线
[00:26.13]我不是在戏弄你
[00:28.69]男孩 我愿为你赴汤蹈火 即使坐牢也在所不惜
[00:33.69]男孩 我愿为你赴汤蹈火 即使坐牢也在所不惜
[00:38.28]男孩 我愿为你赴汤蹈火 即使坐牢也在所不惜
[00:42.92]男孩 我愿为你赴汤蹈火 即使坐牢也在所不惜
[00:47.59]这样真挚的爱情 我已等候多时
[00:52.20]这样真挚的爱情 我已等候多时
[00:56.81]这样真挚的爱情 我已等候多时
[01:01.47]我已等了很久
[01:05.02]继承妈妈的意志 在我的地盘上
[01:07.21]我想一帆风顺 我希望有人跃跃欲试
[01:09.50]试图挑拨我们的关系 这不会有好结果的
[01:11.82]你知道没有人像我一样爱你
[01:14.06]我愿为你赴汤蹈火 回到你身边
[01:16.43]只要能取悦你 我使尽浑身解数
[01:19.15]我愿助你一臂之力
[01:21.06]即使这对你百害无一利
[01:24.47]这样真挚的爱情 我已等候多时
[01:29.01]炽热的感情 我无法抗拒
[01:33.69]仿佛你永远不会犯错 让我迷失自我
[01:38.02]让我松懈 放下防备
[01:42.07]该死 亲爱的 你非我莫属
[01:44.61]你是有史以来最伟大的人
[01:46.29]你最好让那些女人乖乖排队
[01:49.26]我不会自欺欺人
[01:51.12]你对这澎湃的热情了若指掌
[01:53.87]别再挣扎
[01:55.82]你知道我从不说谎
[01:58.46]我想你与我相伴终生
[02:00.88]别让我看上去很傻很天真 
[02:07.37]别让我感觉自己很愚蠢
[02:10.18]选择一位爱人 你让我为你着迷
[02:14.94]有时你只是让我热血沸腾
[02:19.85]这样真挚的爱情 我已等候多时
[02:24.29]这样真挚的爱情 我已等候多时
[02:29.20]这样真挚的爱情 我已等候多时
[02:33.80]我已等了很久
[02:36.85]你给我的爱让我永远无法满足
[02:43.73]我们得到London on da Track的鼎力相助
[02:45.72]如虎添翼
